mapper.select: SELECT A.NO, MEMBER_NO, M.NAME, PRESENCE_TIME, LEAVE_TIME, A.STATUS FROM ATTENDANCE A JOIN MEMBER M ON A.MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{no} ORDER BY PRESENCE_TIME DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTENDANCE
AND M.${searchType} LIKE '%${searchValue.toString()}%'
AND P.NAME LIKE '%${searchValue.toString()}%'
AND D.NAME LIKE '%${searchValue.toString()}%'

SELECT M.NAME MEMBER_NAME, PRESENCE_TIME, LEAVE_TIME, A.STATUS, A.NO NO, D.NAME DEPARTMENT_NAME, P.NAME POSITION_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN ATTENDANCE A ON M.NO = A.MEMBER_NO JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON M.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.NO JOIN POSITION P ON M.POSITION_NO = P.NO
AND M.${searchType} LIKE '%${searchValue.toString()}%'
AND P.NAME LIKE '%${searchValue.toString()}%'
AND D.NAME LIKE '%${searchValue.toString()}%'
ORDER BY PRESENCE_TIME DESC
